Please follow the steps below to check your age:
 1. From your computer open http://www.szynalski.com/tone-generator/ (or any website that can generate different tone frequencies).
 2. Drag the slider on the above webpage to 20 Hz.
 3. Press 'play' on the above webpage to hear the sound frequency.
 4. When ready, press 'play' on the button below to begin checking your age.
You\'re almost done:\n 1. Drag the slider on the webpage until you can\'t hear the tone.\n 2. Press \'pause\' on the button below to finally check your age.
You are more than %1$s years old.
Please grant this app permission to use the mic.
